page.title: 10 Sub-Post Office
page.content: As well as the main post office in Broadstairs, we have a small local post office selling all kinds of things, including envelopes, stamps, sweets, cards, tobacco, etc. The people who run it live above the shop. It is always busy as most people around here are retired and cannot travel very far. There is always a long queue at the door at opening time, and the queue goes out into the street on the days when old people collect their pensions. It is open all day except at lunch time, from 9 a.m until 5.30 p.m. The building is quite old and has always been a shop. Three people work there at present.
